title: Vedanta Aluminium receives BIS certification for high-quality 12 mm aluminium wire rods
description: Vedanta Aluminium has received a certification from the Bureau of Indian Standards (BIS) for its 12 mm aluminium wire rods manufactured at the BALCO facility in Korba, India. In addition, the company has acquired six renewed certifications for other products.

title: Bauxite-rich Guinea redrafts political landscape with new constitution
description: Guinea's military leadership has introduced a draft constitution to reduce presidential terms and limit the number of terms a president can serve the West African nation with the world's largest bauxite reserves on record.

title: Aluminum billets : This week's performance was relatively stable, and the off-season market atmosphere did not see significant improvement
description: Although aluminum billet inventory slightly decreased mid-week, the inventory was affected by low domestic inflow.

title: Aluminum ingot inventory built-up showed signs of accelerating, surpassing 800,000 mt this week
description: As of August 1, 2024, SMM reported a total social inventory of aluminum ingots at 814,000 mt, (the amount for sale stood at 688,000 mt), an increase of 24,000 mt WoW and 289,000 mt higher YoY.

title: In July, domestic alumina costs increased by 1.77% MoM, with strong support from mining costs
description: According to the SMM alumina daily cost model, as of July 31, the weighted average total cost of the domestic alumina industry was 2,867.2 yuan/mt, up 49.7 yuan/mt from the end of June, up 1.77% MoM, and up 7.34% YoY.

title: Aluminum prices to move rangebound due to positive macro front but weak fundamentals
description: This week, the macro front improved.

description: Overnight, LME copper opened at $9,112/mt.

title: The decline in aluminum prices makes it difficult to drive downstream demand. In July, the domestic aluminum processing sector PMI remained below 50% [SMM Downstream In-depth Analysis]

description: Regarding aluminum billet inventory, despite the off-season, the decline in aluminum prices last week did not significantly improve pick-up from warehouses.

title: Aluminum: The sharp drop in aluminum prices has not significantly driven destocking, with Wuxi's inventory far exceeding that of Foshan
description: On July 25, 2024, SMM reported that the total social inventory of aluminum ingots was 790,000 mt, (the amount for sale stood at 664,000 mt), down 7,000 mt WoW and 2,000 mt from July 22, but it is still 254,000 mt higher YoY.

title: China's primary aluminum imports in June decreased by 23.22% MoM. In July, domestic primary aluminum imports are expected to be mainly from long-term contracts
description: In June 2024, the domestic import volume of primary aluminum decreased by 23.22% MoM to 121,200 mt, up 35.61% YoY; the domestic export volume of primary aluminum in June was approximately 7,000 mt, down 78.68% YoY; the net import volume of primary aluminum in June 2024 was 114,200 mt, up 102.5% YoY, down 24.41% MoM.

title: Destocking of aluminum billets continued, with processing fees steadily rising, but downstream demand still lacks growth
description: Regarding aluminum billet inventory, despite the off-season, the decline in aluminum prices last week did not significantly improve pick-up from warehouses.

description: On July 25, 2024, SMM reported that the total social inventory of aluminum ingots was 790,000 mt, (the amount for sale stood at 664,000 mt), down 7,000 mt WoW and 2,000 mt from July 22, but it is still 254,000 mt higher YoY.

title: China's primary aluminum imports in June decreased by 23.22% MoM. In July, domestic primary aluminum imports are expected to be mainly from long-term contracts
description: In June 2024, the domestic import volume of primary aluminum decreased by 23.22% MoM to 121,200 mt, up 35.61% YoY; the domestic export volume of primary aluminum in June was approximately 7,000 mt, down 78.68% YoY; the net import volume of primary aluminum in June 2024 was 114,200 mt, up 102.5% YoY, down 24.41% MoM.

title: Aluminum prices to continue to fall due to weak market sentiment and poor demand

title: SMM Aluminum Market Morning Comment (July 29)
description: Last Friday, the most-traded SHFE 2409 aluminum contract opened at 19,290 yuan/mt, reaching a high of 19,395 yuan/mt and a low of 19,280 yuan/mt, and closed at 19,370 yuan/mt, up 120 yuan/mt, or 0.62%.

title: Destocking of aluminum billets continued, with processing fees steadily rising, but downstream demand still lacks growth
description: Regarding aluminum billet inventory, despite the off-season, the decline in aluminum prices last week did not significantly improve pick-up from warehouses.

title: Aluminum: The sharp drop in aluminum prices has not significantly driven destocking, with Wuxi's inventory far exceeding that of Foshan
description: On July 25, 2024, SMM reported that the total social inventory of aluminum ingots was 790,000 mt, (the amount for sale stood at 664,000 mt), down 7,000 mt WoW and 2,000 mt from July 22, but it is still 254,000 mt higher YoY.

title: China's primary aluminum imports in June decreased by 23.22% MoM. In July, domestic primary aluminum imports are expected to be mainly from long-term contracts
description: In June 2024, the domestic import volume of primary aluminum decreased by 23.22% MoM to 121,200 mt, up 35.61% YoY; the domestic export volume of primary aluminum in June was approximately 7,000 mt, down 78.68% YoY; the net import volume of primary aluminum in June 2024 was 114,200 mt, up 102.5% YoY, down 24.41% MoM.

title: Aluminum prices to continue to fall due to weak market sentiment and poor demand
description: This week, the macro front released some bullish information but met market expectations.

title: SMM Morning Comment For SHFE Base Metals On July 26
description: Overnight, LME copper opened at $9,000/mt, dipping to $8,996.5/mt at the beginning of the session, then fluctuating upwards to a high of $9,169.5/mt, and closed at $9,091/mt, up 0.45%.

title: Join us at IBAAS-IIM 2024: A premier bauxite, alumina & aluminium conference & exhibition at Goa
description: We are delighted to announce the upcoming IBAAS-IIM 2024 International Bauxite, Alumina & Aluminium Conference & Exhibition, set to take place during September 25-27, 2024 in the beautiful Goa, India.

title: Vedanta Aluminium hosts strategic session on red mud utilisation in partnership with NITI Aayog
description: Vedanta Aluminium, India’s largest aluminium producer, in partnership with NITI Aayog and leading national institutions, recently hosted a high-level stakeholder meeting to identify sustainable applications for red mud, a key byproduct in the bauxite refining process for making aluminium.

title: The aluminum price in central China Foshan fell below 19,000 yuan/mt, and the spot market transactions were relatively moderate
description: In the early trading session today, the most-traded SHFE aluminum contract fluctuated downward before slightly rebounding.

title: SMM Morning Comment For SHFE Base Metals On July 25
description: LME copper opened at $9,174.5/mt overnight, initially reaching a high of $9,174.5/mt, then touching a low of $9,050/mt at the end of the trading session, and finally closed at $9,050.5/mt, down 1.16%.

title: Global Aluminium Associations approves new OECD report on state enterprises & subsidies
description: The aluminium associations of the United States, Europe, Canada, and Japan have approved a new report by the Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) titled "Quantifying the Role of State Enterprises in Industrial Subsidies."

title: Intalco Aluminum commits $5.25 million to enhance environmental safety & compliance at Ferndale

title: SMM Aluminum Market Morning Comment (July 25)
description: Market: The most-traded SHFE 2409 aluminum contract opened at 19,350 yuan/mt overnight, reaching a high of 19,360 yuan/mt and a low of 19,255 yuan/mt, and closed at 19,270 yuan/mt, down 50 yuan/mt, a decrease of 0.26%.

title: SMM Morning Comment For SHFE Base Metals On July 24
description: LME copper opened at $9,176/mt overnight, initially reaching a session high of $9,190/mt, hitting a session low of $9,110.5/mt, and finally closed at $9,157/mt, down 0.86%.

title: Domestic aluminum wire exports have declined for two consecutive months MoM. Will overseas demand for aluminum wire show a trend of moving downwards after a higher opening this year? [SMM Analysis]
description: According to customs data, in June 2024, aluminum wire and cable exports were 12,800 mt, marking a decline for two consecutive months, down 23% MoM and 31% YoY.

title: Yamaha Motor to introduce hydrogen-powered aluminium melting technology at new facility
description: Yamaha Motor is set to establish a groundbreaking verification testing facility at its Morimachi Factory in Japan, featuring advanced melting and heat treatment furnaces powered by hydrogen gas.

title: BLT-AlAM500: The cutting-edge aluminium alloy designed for aerospace 3D printing
description: Bright Laser Technologies (BLT) recently unveiled two advanced additive manufacturing materials, including a high-strength aluminium alloy designed specifically for aerospace 3D printing applications.

title: SMM Aluminum Market Morning Comment (July 24)
description: The most-traded SHFE aluminum 2409 contract opened at 19,340 yuan/mt overnight, reaching a high of 19,410 yuan/mt and a low of 19,310 yuan/mt, and closed at 19,350 yuan/mt, up 60 yuan/mt, a decrease of 0.31%.

title: Aluminium plate/sheet, strip and foil production and sales declined due to weak demand [SMM Analysis]
description: According to an SMM survey, as the traditional off-season deepens, the order volume for aluminium plate/sheet, strip and foil producers continues to decline, and the industry's operating rate is gradually decreasing.

title: Aluminum prices are declining. Whether this can effectively lead to destocking? [SMM Analysis]
description: On July 22, 2024, SMM reported that the total social inventory of aluminum ingots was 792,000 mt, (the amount for sale stood at 666,000 mt), down 5,000 mt from last Thursday but still 247,000 mt higher YoY.

title: SMM Morning Comment For SHFE Base Metals On July 23
description: Overnight, LME copper opened and peaked at $9,269/mt, hitting a low of $9,172/mt during the session, and closed at $9,230/mt, down 0.58%.

title: Tiwai Point Aluminium Smelter to cut power usage by 185 megawatts to combat electricity supply constraint
description: The Tiwai Point Aluminium Smelter, owned by Rio Tinto and the Sumitomo Group, has decided to reduce its power consumption by 185 megawatts, which is about 4 per cent of the country's energy usage.

title: RX China hosts record-breaking - Aluminium China 2024, focusing on green smart-aluminium and international cooperation
description: The 19th Aluminium China, Asia's leading aluminium industry trade show and B2B platform for sourcing, branding, networking, and technical exchange, successfully concluded its 2024 expo on July 5 at the Shanghai New International Expo Centre (SNIEC).

title: SMM Aluminum Market Morning Comment (July 23)
description: Overnight, the most-traded SHFE aluminum 2409 contract opened at 19,360 yuan/mt, reaching a high of 19,400 yuan/mt and a low of 19,300 yuan/mt, and closed at 19,360 yuan/mt, down 90 yuan/mt, a decrease of 0.46%.

title: In June 2024, the domestic export volume of primary aluminium was approximately 7,000 mt, up 2.7% MoM, down 78.8% YoY
description: According to customs data, the export volume of domestic primary aluminium in June 2024 was approximately 7,000 mt, up 2.7% MoM, but down 78.8% YoY.

title: Monthly Imports of Bauxite in China in June 2024 (Including Country Rankings)
description: According to the General Administration of Customs of China, in June 2024, China imported 13.3348 million mt of bauxite, down 1.58% MoM and up 15.42% YoY.

title: From January to June, the cumulative export of aluminium extrusion was up 11.61% YoY, mainly due to the price spread between domestic and overseas markets and restocking sentiment [SMM Analysis]
description: According to customs data, in June 2024, the export volume of domestic aluminium extrusion (HS codes 76041010, 76041090, 76042100, 76042910, 76042990) was 97,500 mt, up 6.47% MoM and up 9.14% YoY.

title: China's alumina exports surged in June MoM, and imports are expected to remain low in July [SMM Analysis]
description: According to Chinese customs, in June 2024, China exported 157,100 mt of alumina, with a cumulative export of 810,700 mt from January to June 2024.

title: Aluminium rod processing fees increased by 100-150 yuan/mt, and downstream sentiment showed a significant improvement [SMM Analysis]
description: On July 19, 2024, the average ex-factory processing fee for 1A60 ordinary aluminium rods in Shandong was 450 yuan/mt, up 50 yuan/mt from a week ago.

title: Emission-free solar and electric-powered boats to replace diesel vessels in Chilika Lagoon
description: Chilika Lagoon, Asia’s largest brackish water lake, is set to introduce emission-free solar and electric-powered boats, replacing traditional diesel-powered vessels.

title: Planning Institute of Jamaica reports major growth in bauxite production
description: The Planning Institute of Jamaica's 2023 Economic and Social Survey reveals that the local bauxite sector almost doubled its output last year, significantly contributing to an 86.8 per cent growth in the mining and quarrying industry compared to 2022.

title: SMM Morning Comment For SHFE Base Metals On July 22
description: Last Friday night, LME copper opened at $9,350.5/mt. After a brief initial fluctuation, it rose to a high of $9,374/mt, then fluctuated downward, touching a low of $9,283/mt at the end of the trading session, and finally closed at $9,290/mt, down 0.86%.

title: SMM Aluminum Market Morning Comment (July 22)
description: Last Friday night, the most-traded SHFE aluminum 2409 contract opened at 19,555 yuan/mt, with a high of 19,600 yuan/mt, a low of 19,515 yuan/mt, and closed at 19,515 yuan/mt, down 100 yuan/mt, a decrease of 0.51%.

title: The inventory of aluminum billets has changed, processing fees in three locations are almost the same
description: Due to the further decline in prices, last week's aluminum billet pick-up from warehouses rebounded slightly, increasing by 4,200 mt WoW to 42,400 mt.

title: Aluminum: Social inventory of aluminum ingots increased to a new high in H2, further suppressing spot and futures prices
description: On July 18, 2024, the SMM survey reported a total social inventory of aluminum ingots at 797,000 mt, (the amount for sale stood at 671,000 mt), up 8,000 mt from July 11 and up 10,000 mt from July 15.

title: As domestic aluminum prices fell from highs in June, the supply of domestic aluminum billets showed differences between the north and south
description: As domestic aluminum prices fell from highs in June, the domestic aluminum billet industry has some relief.

title: Aluminum prices to fall due to cautious macro environment and poor demand
description: This week, macro front was significantly impacted by the US Fed's interest rate cut expectations.

title: Critical minerals deal: U.S. approaches Indonesia for environmental collaboration
description: The United States has initiated discussions with Indonesia about joining a multinational partnership to improve Southeast Asia's environmental standards.

title: Indonesian government in talks to ease the severity of bauxite export ban
description: According to Fastmarkets report, the Indonesian government is planning to ease the bauxite export ban due to slower-than-expected progress in developing domestic alumina refineries.

title: SMM Morning Comment For SHFE Base Metals On July 19
description: Overnight, LME copper opened at $9,540/mt, initially hitting a high of $9,541/mt before declining throughout the session. After a brief rebound, it continued to fluctuate downward, hitting a session low of $9,370.5/mt at the end of the trading session and finally closed at $9,371/mt, down 2.55%. Trading volume reached 38,000 lots, and open interest reached 310,000 lots.

title: SMM Aluminum Market Morning Comment (Jul 19)
description: The most-traded SHFE 2409 aluminum contract opened at 19,630 yuan/mt overnight, reaching a high of 19,680 yuan/mt and a low of 19,555 yuan/mt, and closed at 19,575 yuan/mt, down 130 yuan/mt, a decrease of 0.66%.

title: The conversion margin for aluminium rods in June showed a rebound from the previous weakness, but the downward trend in aluminium rod production continued.
description: According to the survey statistics of the SMM analysis team on sample data from aluminium rod producers nationwide, as of July 2024, China's aluminium rod industry had an existing capacity of 7.488 million mt, with the overall operating capacity showing a stable trend.

title: Aluminium prices dropped sharply again, while conversion margins of aluminum billets in east China increased.
description: Today, the SMM A00 spot aluminium price dropped by 190 yuan/mt compared to the previous working day, reporting at 19,570 yuan/mt.

title: Vedanta Aluminium receives BIS certification for high-quality 12 mm aluminium wire rods
description: Vedanta Aluminium has received a certification from the Bureau of Indian Standards (BIS) for its 12 mm aluminium wire rods manufactured at the BALCO facility in Korba, India. In addition, the company has acquired six renewed certifications for other products.

title: Bauxite-rich Guinea redrafts political landscape with new constitution
description: Guinea's military leadership has introduced a draft constitution to reduce presidential terms and limit the number of terms a president can serve the West African nation with the world's largest bauxite reserves on record.

title: Aluminum billets : This week's performance was relatively stable, and the off-season market atmosphere did not see significant improvement
description: Although aluminum billet inventory slightly decreased mid-week, the inventory was affected by low domestic inflow.

title: Aluminum ingot inventory built-up showed signs of accelerating, surpassing 800,000 mt this week
description: As of August 1, 2024, SMM reported a total social inventory of aluminum ingots at 814,000 mt, (the amount for sale stood at 688,000 mt), an increase of 24,000 mt WoW and 289,000 mt higher YoY.

title: In July, domestic alumina costs increased by 1.77% MoM, with strong support from mining costs
description: According to the SMM alumina daily cost model, as of July 31, the weighted average total cost of the domestic alumina industry was 2,867.2 yuan/mt, up 49.7 yuan/mt from the end of June, up 1.77% MoM, and up 7.34% YoY.

title: Aluminum prices to move rangebound due to positive macro front but weak fundamentals
description: This week, the macro front improved.

description: According to SMM data, the comprehensive PMI index of the domestic aluminum processing industry recorded 41.80% in July 2024, up 0.2 percentage points MoM, remaining below 50% for three consecutive months.

description: Canyon Resources Limited has formally signed a mining convention for the Minim-Martap Bauxite Project in Cameroon.
